prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant red wings and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a small insect-like creature that glows in the dark and has intricate patterns.
Design a flying-type Pokemon that resembles a ladybug but with a more fierce appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that can blend into forest environments with colorful markings.
Generate a cute Pokemon with large eyes and a playful demeanor, perfect for children.
Make a unique bug/flying Pokemon that has sparkling wings and a friendly personality.
Give me a Pokemon that flutters around flowers and has an eye-catching red and yellow design.

distinctive_features: Antennae on top of the head
